channel.title: Can NOBODY ANSWER THIS..?!
channel.description:
Ok well basically, my command works perfectly fine if the player is online, does everything i want it to, only it's no use to me if the player is online as it's an ip ban command. I can't un ipban someone that's online, because obviously they're not going to be online...
I've tried [code] if(Server.playerHandler.players[i] == null) { [/code]
That didn't work...
I also tried [code] if(Server.playerHandler.playersCurrentlyOn[i] == null) { [/code]
That didn't work either, so i'm wondering what would check if the player is offline?
If anyone could help me it'd be much appreciated.

item.title: Can NOBODY ANSWER THIS..?!

item.description:
@doom_j wrote:

orcashark:

Bump

Stop bumping the thread, if no one helps then no one helps. In the mean time the person can try and figure it out their self. If your to lazy to go into a file then you must be to lazy to search for the answer on your own.

item.title: Can NOBODY ANSWER THIS..?!
item.dc:creator: @Im_Key Im Key
item.description:
@Im_Key wrote:

Well for one, i’m lazy as hell (xD) and when i’m offline i’d like some of the staff to be able to sort ip bans out, so they can unban without me being there.

Two, when i just delete out of the file for some reason it doesn’t work -.-… I have to restart the server completely for it to take effect.

Read full topic

item.title: Can NOBODY ANSWER THIS..?!
item.dc:creator: @orcashark orcashark
item.description:
@orcashark wrote:

Instead of using a command why dont you just go into Config and click the notepad BannedIps and remove the ip from there. Thats what i always do.

Read full topic

item.title: Can NOBODY ANSWER THIS..?!
item.dc:creator: @Im_Key Im Key
item.description:
@Im_Key wrote:

Ok well basically, my command works perfectly fine if the player is online, does everything i want it to, only it’s no use to me if the player is online as it’s an ip ban command. I can’t un ipban someone that’s online, because obviously they’re not going to be online…

I’ve tried

if(Server.playerHandler.players[i] == null) {

That didn’t work…

I also tried

if(Server.playerHandler.playersCurrentlyOn[i] == null) {

That didn’t work either, so i’m wondering what would check if the player is offline?

If anyone could help me it’d be much appreciated.
